mapper.select:
SELECT A.ID ,B.ID AS AGENT_NOTICE_ID ,A.COMPANY_CODE ,A.ADMIN_ID ,A.TITLE ,A.CONTENT ,A.CATEGORY ,CASE WHEN A.CATEGORY = 'E' THEN '긴급' WHEN A.CATEGORY = 'N' THEN '일반' WHEN A.CATEGORY = 'W' THEN '워닝' ELSE '일반' END AS CATEGORY_NAME ,A.DEPT_CODE ,IF(DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATED_DATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d')) = 0, 'Y', 'N') AS NEW_YN ,IFNULL(B.NOTICE_REMIND_YN,'N') AS NOTICE_REMIND_YN ,B.NOTICE_REMIND ,B.NOTICE_REMIND_TIME ,IFNULL(B.NOTICE_COFIRM_YN, 'N') AS NOTICE_COFIRM_YN ,A.CREATED_DATETIME ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATED_DATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d') AS UPDATED_DATETIME ,REPLACE(REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATED_DATETIME, '%Y.%m.%d %p %h:%i'),'AM', '오전'),'PM','오후') AS CONVERSION_UPDATED_DATETIME FROM DP_ADV_ADMIN_NOTICE A
ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATED_DATETIME, '%Y.%m.%d %p %h:%i') DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT 'ALL' AS CATEGORY ,COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM DP_ADV_ADMIN_NOTICE A
UNION ALL SELECT A.CATEGORY ,COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM DP_ADV_ADMIN_NOTICE A
GROUP BY CATEGORY

SELECT A.ID ,B.ID AS AGENT_NOTICE_ID ,A.COMPANY_CODE ,A.ADMIN_ID ,A.TITLE ,A.CONTENT ,A.CATEGORY ,A.DEPT_CODE ,IF(DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATED_DATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d')) = 0, 'Y', 'N') AS NEW_YN ,IFNULL(B.NOTICE_REMIND_YN,'N') AS NOTICE_REMIND_YN ,B.NOTICE_REMIND ,B.NOTICE_REMIND_TIME ,IFNULL(B.NOTICE_COFIRM_YN, 'N') AS NOTICE_COFIRM_YN ,A.CREATED_DATETIME FROM DP_ADV_ADMIN_NOTICE A INNER JOIN DP_ADV_AGENT_NOTICE B ON ( A.ID = B.ADMIN_NOTICE_ID AND B.NOTICE_REMIND_YN = 'Y' AND B.AGENT_ID = #{agentId} AND B.COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode} )
SELECT DISTINCT AGENT_ID FROM DP_ADV_AGENT WHERE IS_ADMIN = 'N' AND DEPT_CODE = (SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM DP_ADV_DEPT WHERE COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode} AND DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode})
SELECT DISTINCT AGENT_ID FROM DP_ADV_AGENT_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_COFIRM_YN = 'N' AND ADMIN_NOTICE_ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM DP_ADV_AGENT_NOTICE A WHERE DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL ${day} DAY) >= DATE_FORMAT(UPDATED_DATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d')
